verses.name: Luke 18:35
verses.text: And it came to pass, that as he was come nigh unto Jericho, a certain blind man sat by the way side begging:

verses.name: Luke 18:36
verses.text: And hearing the multitude pass by, he asked what it meant.

verses.name: Luke 18:37
verses.text: And they told him, that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by.

verses.name: Luke 18:38
verses.text: And he cried, saying, Jesus, thou Son of David, have mercy on me.

verses.name: Luke 18:39
verses.text: And they which went before rebuked him, that he should hold his peace: but he cried so much the more, Thou Son of David, have mercy on me.
